sentences.sContent: Her position was fortified by election successes and economic recovery.
sentences.sCn: 她的地位因为选举获胜及经济复苏而得到巩固。

synos.tran: 加强；增强；（酒）的酒精含量；设防于

remMethod.val: fort(强大) + ify → 使强大 → 增强营养

words.tran: 堡垒；要塞；（美）边界贸易站

trans.tranOther: to make someone feel physically or mentally stronger
